DOC.brief_summary: To compare calculated biventricular ejection fraction cadmium-zinc-telluride ( CZT ) single photon emission compute tomography ( SPECT ) planar equilibrium radionuclide angiography ( ERNA ) , first-pass radionuclide ventriculography ( FP-RNV ) echocardiogram .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Gated Blood-pool SPECT Echocardiogram Ventricular Function
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate feasibility use CZT SPECT `` all-in-one '' technique provide information leave ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) right ventricular ejection fraction ( RVEF ) derive single examination compare value traditional planar ERNA , FP-RNV echocardiography .
DOC.criteria: Patients underwent transthoracic echocardiogram rest cardiac function within interval 90 day Pregnancy
